# requirements in this file might be forced to compile from sources by specifying the --no-binary :all:.
# for many packages this will not be required, nor preferable. Such packages should hence not be
# added to this file.

numpy==1.22.4  # limited by the below scipy version to < 1.23
scipy==1.7.3  # this is as far as we can go on CentOs7, as newer version require a GCC 5+ compiler
pyzmq==25.1.0
Pillow==10.0.0
